modShortDescription: Right now it reduces things like weapon bags and treasures and stashes. Vanilla has it set up to as 5,7 pieces of loot. This reduces it to more modest 3,5.
modDescription:
This is a work in progress mod. Right now it reduces things like [weapon](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/) bags and treasures and stashes. Vanilla has it set up to as high as 5,7 pieces of loot. This reduces it a bit to a more modest 3,5.

[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/JaxTeller718/JaxTeller718_Modlets_Stable/tree/master/JaxTeller718_ReducedTreasuresLoot)

If you appreciate JaxTeller718’s work here feel free to use this [donate link](https://www.paypal.me/FrankCirabisiJr) to show support.

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/8098-jaxteller718-modlet-collection/).

**Credits:** [JaxTeller718](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/jaxteller718/)
